cleaned_text: Asked for female, 28 years old from Malappuram Hello, Hyper IgE Syndrome is a rare primary immunodeficiency disease characterized by eczema, recurrent staphylococcal skin abscesses, recurrent lung infections, high eosinophilia. Go for meditation to reduce your stress to nourish your body to clear your air passage. I being a homoeopath can suggest some recourse in homoeopathy:@Bacillinum 1000-5 drops, wkly. Avoid, junkfood, alcohol &nicotine. Tk, care.
